about_the_game:
Arcas Champions

Welcome to Arcas Champions, a thrilling third-person ability shooter set in the heart of the Ape Homeworld. Enter a realm where the clash of factions, exotic landscapes, and powerful abilities make every match an exhilarating experience. Choose your Champion, harness unique abilities, and navigate this dense, mysterious world as you fight to dominate.

Setting

The world of Arcas is in civil war. Sparked by the sudden crash of an alien spaceship and the rediscovery of Bastonium—a mysterious, long-forgotten element with immense potential and dangerous properties, Renegades misfits and Village Elite traditionalists battle for control over the planet. As each faction vies to control Bastonium’s power, the line between nature and technology blurs, and a fierce battle for supremacy ensues.

Gameplay

Gameplay revolves around carefully crafted Champion characters, each with unique Stats, Totem-Abilities, and customizable Weapons. Champions can be personalized to fit your playstyle, whether you prefer agilily, damage or support. Master your movements with wall vaults, gliding, and powerful leaps as you swing, jump, and outmaneuver opponents in thrilling jungle skirmishes. Your skills and tactics will be the key to survival and domination in this untamed world.

Game Modes

During Early Access, players can dive into intense online team-based game modes that require both strategic thinking and lightning-fast reflexes. Tribe Wars (TDM), Tribe Supremacy (Control), Brawl (Elimination) and Banana Fever (Extraction) will be the first available modes with more to come over time. Compete in ranked matches to rise through the leaderboards, earning prestige and recognition. As you climb the ranks, you’ll gain influence and prestige, impacting your place within the Arcas world.

Council

As a unique feature of Arcas Champions, the Council allows high-ranking players to participate in shaping the future of the game. Champions who achieve prestige can vote on key changes, from weapon buffs and nerfs to new game modes and community-driven feature proposals. Your input helps define the evolution of Arcas Champions, making this not just a game, but a community-driven experience where your voice truly matters.

short_description: Train and collect ape champions, equip fruit guns and glide into epic online battles in a unique third person ability shooter! Combine totem abilities with friends and dominate the jungle planet in thrilling game modes whilst climbing the leaderboards for glory.
